seo.title: Reseförsäkring för Amalfikusten
seo.description: Vad du ska tänka på när du väljer reseförsäkring för Positano och Amalfikusten.

intro: Travel insurance basics for the Amalfi Coast: health, cancellations, electronics, and activity coverage.

sections.title: Coverage essentials
body: Health/accident, cancellations/delays, and electronics; consider hiking coverage for the Path of the Gods.

sections.title: Claims & docs
body: Keep receipts, police reports for theft, and confirmations of delays/cancellations; check deadlines and original/copy requirements.

faqs.q: Do I need special coverage for ferries?
a: Usually covered under general transport; weather-related delays/cancellations vary by policy — check the conditions.
